description: Replaces an IAM instance profile for the specified running instance. You can use this action to change the IAM instance profile that's associated with an instance without having to disassociate the existing IAM instance profile first. Use  DescribeIamInstanceProfileAssociations to get the association ID.

parameters.name: IamInstanceProfile
parameters.description: The IAM instance profile. Arn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile. Name (string) --- The name of the instance profile.

nested_params.name: Arn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the instance profile.

parameters.name: AssociationId
parameters.description: The ID of the existing IAM instance profile association.

nested_items.name: IamInstanceProfileAssociation
nested_items.description: Information about the IAM instance profile association.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance profile.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The time the IAM instance profile was associated with the instance.
